title: Community Shield Overreaction?
description:
The FC crew continue to preview the upcoming Premier League season and question if the Community Shield performances from Man City and Liverpool should change their predictions for year. Plus, Sid Lowe joins the show to break down Barcelona selling a stake in their own production company and provide updates on how the Catalan club can register all their new players.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Does Liverpool's Community Shield win change the pundits season predictions?; Carney Chukwuemeka set to join Chelsea; Barcelona activate another economic lever

Plus, Sid Lowe joins the show to break down Barcelona selling a stake in their own production company and provide updates on how the Catalan club can register all their new players.
